MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Cromwell St, Leeds St and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.48pm. Our engineers are on site to investigate the network fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15pm.We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.20pm on 11th of Jan 2021
